Text:
Try the below link for the English Subtitles.

http://subscene.com/Service-Entrance-Les-femmes-du-6me-tage/subtitles-90144.aspx

This MKV file has Russian (not English) subtitles. I have posted English subtitles via the torrent:

Les.Femmes.Du.6eme.Etage.2010.BDRip.1080p.srt

Download the srt file and put it in the same folder or DVD as the MKV file with the same name, but with the extension srt (rather than mkv).
Thanks very much, Anonymous. Great quality!
